name: Bullet Reality
description:
After finding a mysterious stone tablet you've been granted the powers of a witch. Survive wave after wave of invading ancient robots. Endless Shoot-em-up gameplay.

Switch between hopping and floating for better control in different situations.

Created for Ludum Dare 36.

Flap mode - Tap to flap

Fly mode - Hold down to rise

Controls:

Jump - Left click or W or Up arrow

Shoot - Right click or D or Right arrow

Switch fly mode - Space

Start - Enter

Art/Programming - Kyle Parsons
Music - Joel Tansley
